name: Wall Defense (mhdlutfi)
description:
WALL DEFENSE is a 3D based game. This game is the result of my big assignment at Telkom University.

This game (WALL DEFENSE) tells the story of a soldier with the best academy graduates. The soldier was assigned to be on the front lines according to the direction of the Konoha Village Military Chief to protect the last stronghold of Konoha Village from monster attacks.

I really hope you will enjoy the game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Controls & Component :

WASD - movement (front, left, back, right)

Space Bar - Shoot all the monster

UI Bar Health, Level Difficult, Menu Panel, Game Over Panel, Score Points

Button Easy, Medium, Hard, Restart, Quit
